title: Frozen Brandy Alexander
directions: In a blender, blend cracked ice, heavy cream, brandy, crème de cacao and Irish Velvet for 30 seconds. Pour into a chilled 8-ounce stemmed glass and sprinkle it with unsweetened cocoa powder.
ingredients: 1/2 pony (1/2 ounce) Irish Velvet (an Irish liqueur made of coffee and whiskey)
